titleStmt.title: The peculier characters of the orientall languages and sundry others exactly delineated for the benefit of all such as are studious in the languages and the choice rarities thereof and for the advancement of language learning in these latter dayes / published by Iosiah Ricraft of London, march't ; and approved by the most learned of the kingdom of England & other foraigne nations.
titleStmt.author: Ricraft, Josiah, fl. 1645-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by authoryty, are to be sould by John Hancock ...,
